blazmod:ButterflyEffect.NAME: Butterfly Effect
blazmod:ButterflyEffect.DESCRIPTION: blazmod:Stance_Swap. NL Gain 1 Strength. NL Gain !M! Weak.

blazmod:Kyokasuigetsu.NAME: Kyokasuigetsu
blazmod:Kyokasuigetsu.DESCRIPTION: Dawnfly: Gain !B! Block and apply !M! Weak. NL πFreeflutter: Deal !D! damage. If the enemy intends to attack, deal !D! damage again.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Deal !D! damage. NL If the enemy intends to attack, double both. NL Apply !M! Weak.
Gain !B! Block. NL Deal !D! damage. NL If the enemy intends to attack, double both. NL Apply !M! Weak.

blazmod:Trasient.NAME: Transience of Eternity
blazmod:Trasient.DESCRIPTION: Dawnfly: Deal !D! damage and draw !M! card. NL πFreeflutter: Deal !D! damage and apply !M! Vulnerable.
blazmod:Trasient.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Dawnfly: Deal !D! damage and draw !M! cards. NL πFreeflutter: Deal !D! damage and apply !M! Vulnerable.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Draw !M! card. NL Apply !M! Vulnerable.
Deal !D! damage. NL Draw !M! cards. NL Apply !M! Vulnerable.

blazmod:KatanaStrike.NAME: Katana Swing
blazmod:KatanaStrike.DESCRIPTION: Dawnfly: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL πFreeflutter: Deal !eded! damage.
blazmod:KatanaStrike.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Dawnfly: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL πFreeflutter: Deal !eded! damage and gain 1 Strength.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL Deal !D! damage.
Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL Deal !eded! damage. NL Gain 1 Strength.

blazmod:Observant.NAME: Observant
blazmod:Observant.DESCRIPTION: blazmod:Stance_Swap. NL Gain 1 Strength. NL Gain Block equal to your Strength.

blazmod:PhoenixPlume.NAME: Phoenix Plume
blazmod:PhoenixPlume.DESCRIPTION: Dawnfly: Gain !B! Block and !M! temporary Dexterity. NL πFreeflutter: Deal !D! damage and discard 2 cards.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block and !M! temporary Dexterity. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Discard 2 cards.
Gain !B! Block and !M! temporary Dexterity. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Discard 2 cards.

blazmod:HarmonyComplete.NAME: Harmony Complete
blazmod:HarmonyComplete.DESCRIPTION: Dawnfly: Gain Block equal to the number of cards in your hand !M! times. Exhaust. NL πFreeflutter: Draw !sillyblue! cards. Deal damage equal to the number of cards in your hand. Discard 3 cards. Exhaust.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Draw !sillyblue! cards. NL Deal damage equal to the number of cards in your hand. NL Gain Block equal to the number of cards in your hand !M! times. NL Discard 3 cards. NL Exhaust.
Draw !sillyblue! cards. NL Deal damage equal to the number of cards in your hand. NL Gain Block equal to the number of cards in your hand !M! times. NL Discard 3 cards. NL Exhaust.

blazmod:RevolvingPhoenix.NAME: Revolving Phoenix
blazmod:RevolvingPhoenix.DESCRIPTION: Gain 1 Frail. NL Whenever you change Stance, gain 1 Strength and draw 1 card.
blazmod:RevolvingPhoenix.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Whenever you change Stance, gain 1 Strength and draw 1 card.

blazmod:Swordstorm.NAME: Swordstorm
blazmod:Swordstorm.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL blazmod:Reverb: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies.

blazmod:DrippingWaterHollowsStone.NAME: Dripping Water Hollows Stone
blazmod:DrippingWaterHollowsStone.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play !M! cards in a turn, gain 1 Strength and blazmod:Stance_Swap.

blazmod:BlindingFlash.NAME: Blinding Flash
blazmod:BlindingFlash.DESCRIPTION: Apply 3 Weak. NL blazmod:Reverb: Apply 1 Vulnerable.
blazmod:BlindingFlash.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Apply 3 Weak. NL Draw 1 card. NL blazmod:Reverb: Apply 1 Vulnerable.

blazmod:Quickdraw.NAME: Quickdraw
blazmod:Quickdraw.DESCRIPTION: Can only be played if no Attacks have been played this turn. NL Gain !B! Block and 1 Blur. NL End the turn.

blazmod:OpenSpirit.NAME: Open Spirit
blazmod:OpenSpirit.DESCRIPTION: blazmod:Stance_Swap. NL Gain 1 Strength. NL blazmod:Trance: Gain !M! Weak.

blazmod:Purgatory.NAME: Purgatory
blazmod:Purgatory.DESCRIPTION: Discard any number of cards. NL Gain [E] and !B! Block for each card discarded.

blazmod:DanceOfTheGods.NAME: Dance of the Gods
blazmod:DanceOfTheGods.DESCRIPTION: Enemy loses 1 Strength. NL blazmod:Reverb: Gain 1 Strength.

blazmod:EightLifePilgrimage.NAME: Eight-Life's Pilgrimage
blazmod:EightLifePilgrimage.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Heal 8 HP. NL Gain !B! Block. NL Draw 8 cards. NL Gain 8 Strength. NL Exhaust.

blazmod:DevilDivine.NAME: Devil Divine
blazmod:DevilDivine.DESCRIPTION: Draw 1 card. NL Discard 1 card. NL Gain [E] . NL Gain !B! Block. NL blazmod:Reverb: Repeat all that.

blazmod:BladeGod.NAME: Blade God
blazmod:BladeGod.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you discard a card, gain [E] .

blazmod:DawnflutterDance.NAME: Dance of the Butterflies
blazmod:DawnflutterDance.DESCRIPTION: Dawnfly: Deal !D! damage and gain 3 Strength. Exhaust. NL πFreeflutter: Deal !D! damage and gain 2 Buffer. Exhaust.
blazmod:DawnflutterDance.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Dawnfly: Deal !D! damage. Gain 3 Strength and 3 Vigor. Exhaust. NL πFreeflutter: Deal !D! damage. Gain 2 Buffer and remove your debuffs. Exhaust.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Gain 3 Strength and 1 Buffer. NL Exhaust.
Deal !D! damage. NL Gain 3 Strength and 1 Buffer. NL Gain 10 Vigor and remove all debuffs. NL Exhaust.

blazmod:GlasswingWaltz.NAME: Glasswing Waltz
blazmod:GlasswingWaltz.DESCRIPTION: Your next Stance split card gets both effects.

blazmod:ButterFlutter.NAME: Butter Flutter
blazmod:ButterFlutter.DESCRIPTION: Dawnfly: Gain !B! Block. blazmod:Trance: Then remove half of your Block. NL πFreeflutter: Deal !D! damage. blazmod:Trance: That enemy gains 1 Strength.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Trance: Then remove half of your block and enemy gains 1 Strength.
Gain !B! Block. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Trance: Then remove half of your block and enemy gains 1 Strength.

blazmod:PhysicalEndurance.NAME: Physical Endurance
blazmod:PhysicalEndurance.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL blazmod:Reverb: Gain !M! temporary Dexterity.

blazmod:MentalFocus.NAME: Mental Focus
blazmod:MentalFocus.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL blazmod:Trance: Lose 3 temporary Strength.

blazmod:InLoveAndWar.NAME: In Love And War
blazmod:InLoveAndWar.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Your next Attack is played twice.

blazmod:FleetingDawn.NAME: Fleeting Dawn
blazmod:FleetingDawn.DESCRIPTION: Gain 1 Strength whenever you play an Attack, up to !M!. NL blazmod:Trance: Lose 2 Strength.

blazmod:FancifulFlutter.NAME: Fanciful Flutter
blazmod:FancifulFlutter.DESCRIPTION: Gain 1 Dexterity whenever you play a Skill, up to !M!. NL At the end of your turn, if you haven't played an Attack this combat, gain 1 blazmod:Reflection.

blazmod:OneWithNature.NAME: One with Nature
blazmod:OneWithNature.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Gain Block equal to unblocked damage dealt. NL Gain 1 blazmod:Reflection.

blazmod:MoonlightBlossoms.NAME: Moonlight Blossoms
blazmod:MoonlightBlossoms.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Apply 3 Vulnerable. NL If you have no more than !M! energy, gain 1 Strength. NL Exhaust.

blazmod:Crosscut.NAME: Crosscut
blazmod:Crosscut.DESCRIPTION: Dawnfly: Gain !B! Block twice. NL πFreeflutter: Deal !D! damage twice.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block and deal !D! damage twice.
Gain !B! Block and deal !D! damage twice.

blazmod:Valiance.NAME: Valiance
blazmod:Valiance.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL blazmod:Trance: Shuffle !M! *Dazed into your draw pile.

blazmod:QuickBlade.NAME: Quick as a Blade
blazmod:QuickBlade.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL If this is the first card you played this turn, deal !D! damage to ALL enemies again.

blazmod:SecondSight.NAME: Second Sight
blazmod:SecondSight.DESCRIPTION: Put 1 card from your discard pile into your hand. NL Exhaust.
blazmod:SecondSight.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Put 1 card from your discard pile into your hand.

blazmod:BladeOfEnlightenment.NAME: Blade of Enlightenment
blazmod:BladeOfEnlightenment.DESCRIPTION: Dawnfly: Deal !D! damage and draw 1 card. NL πFreeflutter: Gain !B! Block.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Draw 1 card. NL Gain !B! Block.
Deal !D! damage. NL Draw 1 card. NL Gain !B! Block.

blazmod:SidewaySolace.NAME: Sideway Solace
blazmod:SidewaySolace.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! temporary Strength. NL Gain 2 Vulnerable.

blazmod:FlashRock.NAME: Flash Rock
blazmod:FlashRock.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL You may discard 1 card. NL If you do, draw 1 card.

blazmod:MindsEye.NAME: Mind's Eye
blazmod:MindsEye.DESCRIPTION: Draw 1 card. NL blazmod:Reverb: Draw 1 card.

blazmod:LoveAndHonor.NAME: Love and Honor
blazmod:LoveAndHonor.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you change Stances, gain !M! Block.

blazmod:BoulderFlash.NAME: Boulder Flash
blazmod:BoulderFlash.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Gain Block equal to unblocked damage dealt. NL Exhaust.

blazmod:Unrestrained.NAME: Unrestrained
blazmod:Unrestrained.DESCRIPTION: Dawnfly: Gain !B! Block if the enemy intends to attack. blazmod:Stance_Swap. NL πFreeflutter: Deal !D! damage to an enemy without Block. blazmod:Stance_Swap.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block if the enemy intends to attack. NL Deal !D! damage if the enemy doesn't have Block. NL blazmod:Stance_Swap.
Gain !B! Block if the enemy intends to attack. NL Deal !D! damage if the enemy doesn't have Block. NL blazmod:Stance_Swap.

blazmod:StanceChange.NAME: Stance Change
blazmod:StanceChange.DESCRIPTION: blazmod:Stance_Swap. NL Gain 1 Strength. NL Gain 1 Weak. NL Exhaust.

blazmod:ClearTheMindPower.NAME: Clear The Mind
blazmod:ClearTheMindPower.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you discard a card, gain !M! Block.

blazmod:SureOfHand.NAME: Sure of Hand
blazmod:SureOfHand.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL You may discard 1 card. NL If you do, return !M! card from your discard pile to your hand.
blazmod:SureOfHand.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL You may discard 1 card. NL If you do, return !M! cards from your discard pile to your hand.

blazmod:PureOfSoul.NAME: Pure Of Soul
blazmod:PureOfSoul.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Weak. NL Apply !M! Vulnerable. NL blazmod:Trance: Apply to yourself too.

blazmod:BeTheBlade.NAME: Be The Blade
blazmod:BeTheBlade.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Gain !M! Temporary Strength.

blazmod:UnderPurifyingWaters.NAME: Under Purifying Waters
blazmod:UnderPurifyingWaters.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you change Stances, draw !M! card, then Exhaust !M! card.
blazmod:UnderPurifyingWaters.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Whenever you change Stances, draw !M! cards, then Exhaust !M! cards.

blazmod:CastAwayDew.NAME: Cast Away Dew
blazmod:CastAwayDew.DESCRIPTION: Dawnfly: This turn, whenever you discard a card, gain 5 Block. NL πFreeflutter: Remove the enemy's Block.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Remove the enemy's Block. NL This turn, whenever you discard a card, gain 5 Block.
Remove the enemy's Block. NL This turn, whenever you discard a card, gain 5 Block.

blazmod:BlindBlade.NAME: Blind Blade
blazmod:BlindBlade.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Vigor. NL Gain !sillyblue! Strength. NL You cannot play Attacks this turn. NL Exhaust.

blazmod:FocusThroughFalls.NAME: Focus Through Falls
blazmod:FocusThroughFalls.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust 1 card. NL Gain !B! Block. NL blazmod:Reverb: Gain !B! Block.

blazmod:Contingency.NAME: Contingency
blazmod:Contingency.DESCRIPTION: Whenever an Attack deals unblocked damage, put a random Basic card from your draw pile into your hand.

blazmod:ButterflyBlade.NAME: Butterfly Blade
blazmod:ButterflyBlade.DESCRIPTION: Dawnfly: Retain. Deal !D! damage. blazmod:Stance_Swap. NL πFreeflutter: Retain. Gain !B! Block. blazmod:Stance_Swap.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Gain !B! Block. NL blazmod:Stance_Swap.
Retain. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Gain !B! Block. NL blazmod:Stance_Swap.

blazmod:ButterflyForm.NAME: Buttefly Form
blazmod:ButterflyForm.DESCRIPTION: Your Stance split cards get both effects.

blazmod:TrueSelf.NAME: True Self
blazmod:TrueSelf.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Gain !M! Intangible. NL Exhaust.
blazmod:TrueSelf.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Gain !M! Intangible. NL Exhaust.

blazmod:Lockswords.NAME: Lockswords
blazmod:Lockswords.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Next turn, gain 1 Buffer. NL Exhaust

blazmod:HoumatsuMugenKochouji.NAME: Houmatsu-Mugen Kochoiji
blazmod:HoumatsuMugenKochouji.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block for each enemy that intends to attack. NL Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies for each enemy that doesn't. NL Exhaust.

blazmod:CrescentMoon.NAME: Crescent Moon
blazmod:CrescentMoon.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If Fatal, increase your Max HP by !D!. NL Fleeting.

blazmod:AlmightyPassage.NAME: Almighty Passage
blazmod:AlmightyPassage.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL Kill all enemies with less than !M! HP.

blazmod:VisionsOfButterflies.NAME: Visions of Butterflies
blazmod:VisionsOfButterflies.DESCRIPTION: Discard your hand, then draw that many cards. NL Gain Temporary Strength equal to the number of cards discarded.

blazmod:MindAtPeace.NAME: Mind at Peace
blazmod:MindAtPeace.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Next turn, gain Vigor equal to Block lost this turn. NL Exhaust.

blazmod:Setsuna.NAME: Setsuna
blazmod:Setsuna.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust. NL blazmod:Reverb: Discard your hand and take an extra turn.

blazmod:MirrorImage.NAME: Mirror Image
blazmod:MirrorImage.DESCRIPTION: The first card you play each turn is played twice.
blazmod:MirrorImage.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: The first 2 cards you play each turn are played twice.

blazmod:ClearTheMind.NAME: Clear the Mind
blazmod:ClearTheMind.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you discard a card, gain !M! Block.

blazmod:NaturesBeauty.NAME: Nature's Beauty
blazmod:NaturesBeauty.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL The first time you play a card each turn, put a card with its type from your draw pile into your hand.
blazmod:NaturesBeauty.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: The first time you play a card each turn, put a card with its type from your draw pile into your hand.

blazmod:FortifiedVigor.NAME: Fortified Vigor
blazmod:FortifiedVigor.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL blazmod:Trance: Exhaust.

blazmod:TrueOfHeart.NAME: True of Heart
blazmod:TrueOfHeart.DESCRIPTION: The first time you play an Attack each turn, gain !M! Metallicize.

blazmod:TenThousand.NAME: Walk 10,000 Miles
blazmod:TenThousand.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL The next Attack you play costs 0.

blazmod:TravelJournal.NAME: Travel Journal
blazmod:TravelJournal.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, if you took no damage last turn, draw 1 card.

blazmod:FlyFlyAgain.NAME: Fly, Fly Again
blazmod:FlyFlyAgain.DESCRIPTION: The first time your Block is broken each turn, gain 1 blazmod:Reflection.
blazmod:FlyFlyAgain.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL The first time your Block is broken each turn, gain 1 blazmod:Reflection.

blazmod:WildButterfly.NAME: Wild Butterfly
blazmod:WildButterfly.DESCRIPTION: The next card you play is played 2 additional times. NL Exhaust.

blazmod:ApexLegends.NAME: Apex of Nothingness
blazmod:ApexLegends.DESCRIPTION: Dawnfly: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies X times. NL πFreeflutter: Draw X cards.
blazmod:ApexLegends.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Dawnfly: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies X times. NL πFreeflutter: Draw X cards and Retain your hand this turn.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies X times. NL Draw X cards.
Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies X times. NL Draw X cards. NL Retain your hand this turn.

blazmod:SeismicSlash.NAME: Seismic Slash
blazmod:SeismicSlash.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! [E] . NL Deal !D! damage. NL Draw 3 cards. NL Exhaust. NL blazmod:Trance: Lose !sillyblue! [E] next turn.

blazmod:FlawlessDraw.NAME: Dauntless Draw
blazmod:FlawlessDraw.DESCRIPTION: Dawnfly: Deal !D! damage and gain !B! Block. NL πFreeflutter: Deal !D! damage, twice if no damage was taken last turn.
blazmod:FlawlessDraw.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Dawnfly: Deal !D! damage and gain !B! Block. NL πFreeflutter: Retain. Deal !D! damage, twice if no damage was taken last turn.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage and gain !B! Block. NL Double both if you took no damage last turn.
Retain. NL Deal !D! damage and gain !B! Block. NL Double both if you took no damage last turn.

blazmod:ForgeWays.NAME: Forge Ways
blazmod:ForgeWays.DESCRIPTION: Autoplay. NL Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL Shuffle !M! copy of this card into your draw pile. NL blazmod:Reverb: Take 3 damage.
blazmod:ForgeWays.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Autoplay. NL Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL Shuffle !M! copy of this card into your draw pile. NL blazmod:Reverb: Take 2 damage.
